questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had 1 million euros, I would depense it in a lot of things.
Firstly, I would give 70 000 euros in different associations like "Iles de Paix", "Action Damien",... because I know this associations and the work they do and I like them.
Then, I would like to travel around the world to meet different people, to discover different lifestyles and a lot of countries and beautiful landscapes. I wouldn't depense a lot in this project.
Finally, I would give the rest of the 1 million euros to scientific researches about how to give enough alimentation at all people in the world.
